`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/Farlight.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class FarlightProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    FarlightProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Farlight 84";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.miraclegames.farlight84"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());

        static bool once = false;
        if (!once)
        {
            once = true;
            offsets.FUObjectArray.ObjObjects += sizeof(void*);
        }

        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/HelloNeighbor.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class HelloNeighborProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    HelloNeighborProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Hello Neighbor";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.tinybuildgames.helloneighbor"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }
    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/HelloNeighborND.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class HelloNeighborNDProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    HelloNeighborNDProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Hello Neighbor Nicky's Diaries";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.tinybuildgames.hndiaries"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE5_00_02(isUsingCasePreservingName(), isUsingOutlineNumberName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/Injustice2.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class Injustice2Profile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    Injustice2Profile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Injustice 2";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.wb.goog.injustice.brawler2017"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/KingArthur.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class KingArthurProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    KingArthurProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "King Arthur Legends Rise";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.kabam.knights.legends"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE5_00_02(isUsingCasePreservingName(), isUsingOutlineNumberName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/Lineage2.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class Lineage2Profile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    Lineage2Profile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Lineage 2 Revolution";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.netmarble.lin2ws"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return false;
    }
    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray == 0)
        {
            LOGE("Failed to find GUObjectArray symbol.");
            return 0;
        }
        return guobjectarray;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t GNamesInit = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("_ZN5FName16GetIsInitializedEv");
        if (GNamesInit == 0)
        {
            LOGE("Failed to find _ZN5FName16GetIsInitializedEv symbol.");
            return 0;
        }

        uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(GNamesInit);
        return adrl ? (adrl + GetPtrAlignedOf(sizeof(bool))) : 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_00_17(isUsingCasePreservingName());

        static bool once = false;
        if (!once)
        {
            once = true;
            offsets.FUObjectItem.Size = (sizeof(void *) + (sizeof(int32_t) * 2));
        }

        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/LineageW.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class LineageWProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    LineageWProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Lineage W";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.ncsoft.lineagew"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }
    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

```hpp
#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class MortalKombatProfile : public IGameProfile

public:

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {

        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    {

    }

    {
        return {"com.wb.goog.mkx"};
    }

    {
        return true;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},

            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };


        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;

        return &offsets;
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/NightCrows.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class NightCrowsProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    NightCrowsProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Night Crows";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.wemade.nightcrows", "com.wemade.nightcrowsglobal"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE5_00_02(isUsingCasePreservingName(), isUsingOutlineNumberName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/OdinValhalla.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class OdinValhallaProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    OdinValhallaProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Odin Valhalla Rising";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.kakaogames.gbod"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_23_24(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class PESProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    PESProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "eFootball (PES)";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"jp.konami.pesam"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/PUBG.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class PUBGProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    PUBGProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "PUBG";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {
            "com.tencent.ig",
            "com.rekoo.pubgm",
            "com.pubg.imobile",
            "com.pubg.krmobile",
            "com.vng.pubgmobile",
        };
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::string ida_pattern = "12 40 B9 ? 3E 40 B9 ? ? ? 6B ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91";
        const int step = 0xf;

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        return Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::string ida_pattern =  "81 80 52 ? ? ? ? ? 81 80 52 ? 03 1F 2A";
        const int step = 0x1f;

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        uintptr_t param_1 = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
        if (param_1 == 0)
            return 0;

        int64_t var_2;
        int64_t var_5[16];

        var_2 = (vm_rpm_ptr<int32_t>((void *)(param_1)) - 100) / 3u;
        var_5[(uint32_t)(var_2 - 1)] = vm_rpm_ptr<int64_t>((void *)(param_1 + 8));

        while (var_2 - 2 >= 0)
        {
            var_5[(uint32_t)(var_2 - 2)] = vm_rpm_ptr<int64_t>((void *)(var_5[var_2 - 1]));
            --var_2;
        }

        return var_5[0];
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_18_19(isUsingCasePreservingName());

        static bool once = false;
        if (!once)
        {
            once = true;
            offsets.FNameEntry.Index = sizeof(void *);
            offsets.FNameEntry.Name = sizeof(void *) + sizeof(int32_t);
        }

        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class RLSideswipeProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    RLSideswipeProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "RL Sideswipe";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.Psyonix.RL2D"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/RealBoxing2.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class RealBoxing2Profile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    RealBoxing2Profile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Real Boxing 2";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.vividgames.realboxing2"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };


        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_23_24(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/RooftopsParkour.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class RooftopParkourProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    RooftopParkourProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Rooftops Parkour Pro";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.GreenGoGames.RooftopPrakourFreerun"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE5_03(isUsingCasePreservingName(), isUsingOutlineNumberName());

        static bool once = false;
        if (!once)
        {
            once = true;

            // not pointer aligned
            offsets.FUObjectItem.Size = sizeof(void *) + (sizeof(int32_t) * 3);
        }

        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/SFG2.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class SFG2Profile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    SFG2Profile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_ARM || e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Special Forces Group 2";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.ForgeGames.SpecialForcesGroup2"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray == 0)
        {
            LOGE("Failed to find GUObjectArray symbol.");
            return 0;
        }
        return guobjectarray;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t GFNameTableForDebuggerVisualizers_MT = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GFNameTableForDebuggerVisualizers_MT");
        if (GFNameTableForDebuggerVisualizers_MT == 0)
        {
            LOGE("Failed to find GFNameTableForDebuggerVisualizers_MT symbol.");
            return 0;
        }

        return GFNameTableForDebuggerVisualizers_MT;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_22(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/Torchlight.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class TorchlightProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    TorchlightProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Torchlight: Infinite";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.xd.TLglobal"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            {"f8 c8 ? ? 39 c8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 9},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

`AndUEDumper/src/UE/UEGameProfiles/TowerFantasy.hpp`:

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class TowerFantasyProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    TowerFantasyProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Tower Of Fantasy";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.levelinfinite.hotta.gp"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};

```

```hpp
#pragma once

#include "../UEGameProfile.hpp"
using namespace UEMemory;

class WutheringWavesProfile : public IGameProfile
{
public:
    WutheringWavesProfile() = default;

    bool ArchSupprted() const override
    {
        auto e_machine = GetUnrealELF().header().e_machine;
        return e_machine == EM_AARCH64 || e_machine == EM_ARM;
    }

    std::string GetAppName() const override
    {
        return "Wuthering Waves";
    }

    std::vector<std::string> GetAppIDs() const override
    {
        return {"com.kurogame.wutheringwaves.global"};
    }

    bool isUsingCasePreservingName() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool IsUsingFNamePool() const override
    {
        return true;
    }

    bool isUsingOutlineNumberName() const override
    {
        return false;
    }

    uintptr_t GetGUObjectArrayPtr() const override
    {
        uintptr_t guobjectarray = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GUObjectArray");
        if (guobjectarray != 0)
            return guobjectarray;

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            {"91 E1 03 ? AA E0 03 08 AA E2 03 1F 2A", -7},
            {"B4 21 0C 40 B9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 5},
            {"9F E5 00 ? 00 E3 FF ? 40 E3 ? ? A0 E1", -2},
            {"96 df 02 17 ? ? ? ? 54 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 e1 03 13 aa", 9},
            {"f4 03 01 2a ? 00 00 34 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 00 54 ? 00 00 14 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
            {"69 3e 40 b9 1f 01 09 6b ? ? ? 54 e1 03 13 aa ? ? ? ? f4 4f ? a9 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},
        };


        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    uintptr_t GetNamesPtr() const override
    {
        // GNameBlocksDebug = &NamePoolData + Blocks offset
        uintptr_t blocks_p = GetUnrealELF().findSymbol("GNameBlocksDebug");
        if (blocks_p != 0)
        {
            blocks_p = vm_rpm_ptr<uintptr_t>((void *)blocks_p);
            if (blocks_p != 0)
                return (blocks_p - GetOffsets()->FNamePool.BlocksOff);
        }

        std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int>> idaPatterns = {
            // FNameEntry const* FName::GetEntry(FNameEntryId id);
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x18},
            {"F4 4F 01 A9 FD 7B 02 A9 FD 83 00 91 ? ? ? ? A8 02 ? 39", 0x24},

            // DebugDump
            {"fd 7b 01 a9 fd 43 00 91 ? ? ? ? 89 ? ? 39 f3 03 08 aa c9 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 0x18},

            // GetPlainName ToString AppendString GetStringLength
            {"02 ? 91 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91", 7},

            {"39 C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52 ? ? ? 39", 5},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97 ? 00 80 52", 4},
            {"C8 00 00 37 ? ? ? ? ? ? ? 91 ? ? ? 97", 4},
        };

        PATTERN_MAP_TYPE map_type = isEmulator() ? PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_R : PATTERN_MAP_TYPE::ANY_X;

        for (const auto &it : idaPatterns)
        {
            std::string ida_pattern = it.first;
            const int step = it.second;

            uintptr_t adrl = Arm64::DecodeADRL(findIdaPattern(map_type, ida_pattern, step));
            if (adrl != 0) return adrl;
        }

        return 0;
    }

    UE_Offsets *GetOffsets() const override
    {
        static UE_Offsets offsets = UE_DefaultOffsets::UE4_25_27(isUsingCasePreservingName());
        return &offsets;
    }
};
```
